sentences.en: A: Please fill in the remittance slip in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 请您填写汇款凭证,一式三份.

sentences.en: All drawings to be submitted in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 所有图纸须提交三份.

sentences.en: All samples were analyzed in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 所有的样本都分析三次.

sentences.en: Applications have to be made out in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 申请书得填写一式三份.

sentences.en: Applications must be made out in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 申请书必须填写一式三份.

sentences.en: Applications must is made out in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 申请书必须填写一式叁份.

sentences.en: C : Parking list in triplicate indicating goods name and quantity.
sentences.cn: 全套的清洁已装船提单原件,空白抬头.

sentences.en: Enclosed is our invoice in triplicate for Art . No.1204.
sentences.cn: 随函附上 1204 号货物的发票一式三份.

sentences.en: Enclosed is our Proforma Invoice in triplicate for Art.
sentences.cn: 随函附上货号的我公司形式发票一式三份.

sentences.en: Is it really necessary to complete the forms in triplicate?
sentences.cn: 这些表格真有必要一式三份填写吗？

sentences.en: Please fill in this exchange slip in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 请填写兑换清单一式三联.

sentences.en: Signed detail packing list required triplicate.
sentences.cn: 要求需要三份装箱单清单.

sentences.en: The contract has been written in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 这份合同写成一式三份.

sentences.en: The document was drawn up in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 该文件写成一式三份.

sentences.en: the procedure was repeated in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 手续重复了三次。

sentences.en: The Proforma Invoice in triplicate enclosed does not imply acceptance of your order as both price and quantity stated therein are without engagement.
sentences.cn: 所附形式发票一式三份并不意味我们接受贵方订单，因为所列价格与数量是不受约束的。

sentences.en: The triplets celebrated their first birthday at the weekend after a 'fun filled year' where everything had to be done in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 在度过了所有东西都一式三份的相当有趣的一年时光后，三胞胎在本周末庆祝了她们的第一个生日。

sentences.en: This application in triplicate will be retained respectively by personnel department, public security department and the applicant.
sentences.cn: 此表一式三份，人事行政部门、公安部门、申请单位或个人各存一份。

sentences.en: To draw up ( a document ) in duplicate or triplicate.
sentences.cn: 一式两份或三份地起草 ( 文件 )

sentences.en: We would like the invoice for this order sent in triplicate.
sentences.cn: 我们要这份订单的发票,寄三联来.

words.tran_cn: 三重的；分成三部分的；一式三份的

trans.tran_en: if a document is in triplicate, there are three copies of it
